name: Admin Bar Theme Switcher
author: Ryan Duff / Fusionized Technology

sections.description: Allow admin users to switch which theme they use on your WordPress, WordPress MU, or BuddyPress site. Adds a drop down on the Admin Bar with a drop down to choose from installed themes.
sections.installation:
1. Download and extract the theme-switcher plugin file.
  2. Upload the theme-switcher directory to the /wp-content/plugins/ directory.
  3. Activate the plugin under the ‘Plugins’ menu in the WordPress admin.
  4. Make sure you have the WordPress Admin bar enabled when viewing site.
